LiveCC is a video Large Language Model (LLM) designed for real-time commentary generation. It utilizes a novel streaming speech transcription method to process video and generate commentary, achieving state-of-the-art performance on both streaming and offline benchmarks.

xleak is a fast terminal-based Excel viewer built with Rust and ratatui. It provides an interactive TUI for navigating and searching spreadsheet data, supporting various Excel and OpenDocument formats with features like lazy loading for large files and export capabilities.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

filesql is a Go SQL driver that allows users to query various file formats like CSV, TSV, LTSV, Parquet, and Excel using standard SQLite3 SQL syntax. It supports multiple compression formats and flexible input sources, enabling in-memory data processing without external databases.
